description: Tell us your Buddies XI for cup clash
title: Tell us your Buddies XI for cup clash
title_page: Tell us your Buddies XI for cup clash - BBC Sport
maintext:
St Mirren's task on Saturday is simple, beat Forfar and they'll top Group H of the Viaplay Cup and progress through to the next round.
Stephen Robinsonâ€™s team have won two on the spin since that shock defeat to Montrose.
